Uses of Interface
sensors.SensorListener

  • Packages that use SensorListener 
    Package Description
    controllers  
    sensors  

    • Uses of SensorListener in controllers

      Classes in controllers that implement SensorListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AvoidController
      This controller need to drive around an obstacle blocking the path.
      class  CalibrateController
      This controller calibrates the light sensors.
      class  Controller
      This controller lets other controllers switch between each other, it can turn controllers on or off and it calls the control method of the currently running controllers.
      class  DestinationController
      The controller that tries to follow the line to the destination.

    • Uses of SensorListener in sensors

      Fields in sensors with type parameters of type SensorListener 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<SensorListener> Sensor.listeners
      All listeners of this sensor that will get updates of the sensor state.
      Methods in sensors with parameters of type SensorListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Sensor.addListener(SensorListener listener)
      Add listener to the "listeners" ArrayList.
